name: str::<impl str>::as_ascii_unchecked

str::<impl str>::as_bytes.doc:
Converts a string slice to a byte slice. To convert the byte slice back
 into a string slice, use the [`from_utf8`] function.

 # Examples

 ```
 let bytes = "bors".as_bytes();
 assert_eq!(b"bors", bytes);
 ```

slice::ascii::<impl [u8]>::as_ascii_unch.doc:
Converts this slice of bytes into a slice of ASCII characters,
 without checking whether they're valid.

 # Safety

 Every byte in the slice must be in `0..=127`, or else this is UB.

doc:
Converts this string slice into a slice of [ASCII characters](ascii::Char),
 without checking whether they are valid.

 # Safety

 Every character in this string must be ASCII, or else this is UB.
